attributes.name: type
attributes.description: package Type (e.g. Core / Application / SRP / LRP)

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: Current Version generated while packaging on build server

attributes.name: mininumAgentVersion
attributes.description: Minimum Agent Version required, if present Utility validates it before performing any operation

attributes.name: operations
attributes.description: Array for Operations to be performed on endpoint by installation manager

attributes.name: uninstallOperations
attributes.description: Array for Uninstall Operations to be performed on endpoint by installation manager while uninstallation

attributes.name: unsupportedOS
attributes.description: List of Operating System Supported by the Packages available in this file

attributes.name: supportedArch
attributes.description: List of Supported Architecture for this Package (e.g. i386 / Darwin etc.)

attributes.name: backup
attributes.description: List of files to be backed up while Installation or uninstallation
